participant_1.background:
I love nature documentaries because they make me feel like I'm exploring the wilderness without leaving my couch.
i am not very good at playing basketball.
My family is supportive of my musical dreams, and we often go to the opera together.
My favorite music is techno, it helps me get in the zone for my workouts.
i eat tuna fish salad at least every day.

participant_2.background:
I sometimes spend too much time procrastinating on my homework.
i want to learn how to fly an airplane.
My school life is going well, though I am a bit tired from working so many hours at the food pantry.
i like camping and the outdoors in general.
My most prized possession is my running shoes because they have helped me to stay healthy and active throughout the years.

content.text: Hi! I'm a big fan of nature documentaries.
Awesome! They're so relaxing and educational.
I know right? I love learning about all the different animals and plants that live in the wild.
Me too! Have you seen the new David Attenborough documentary about the blue planet?
Yes! It was so good! I loved learning about all the different marine life.
Me too! It was so interesting to see how all the different animals interact with each other.
I know right? I really want to go scuba diving now and see all those animals for myself!
That would be amazing! I'm sure you'd love it.
I know I would! Maybe we can go together sometime?
Great! We can talk about it more later.
